name: StormPC
tagline: Modern WinUI Laptop Store Management System
description: A comprehensive desktop application for laptop store management built with WinUI 3 and .NET 8. Features secure authentication, inventory management, order processing, customer management, and advanced reporting with dark mode support.

responsibilities: Architected WinUI 3 application with MVVM pattern using CommunityToolkit.Mvvm
Developed Entity Framework Core with PostgreSQL database integration
Implemented secure authentication system with Argon2id password encryption
Built comprehensive inventory management system for laptop products
Created advanced reporting system with charts using LiveCharts2
Designed responsive UI with dark mode support and modern WinUI controls

features: Secure login system with Argon2id encryption and backup key recovery
Comprehensive laptop inventory management with detailed specifications
Advanced order management and payment processing system
Multi-dimensional reporting with revenue, inventory, and customer analytics
Real-time activity logging for all user interactions
Advanced search functionality with multi-criteria filtering
Responsive dark mode interface with modern WinUI design

metrics: Complete CRUD operations for laptops, categories, brands, and specifications
Comprehensive order processing system with status tracking
Advanced reporting dashboard with visual charts and data tables
Multi-user activity logging and audit trail system
highlights: Built scalable WinUI 3 desktop application with modern MVVM architecture
Implemented enterprise-level security with Argon2id password hashing
Created comprehensive database schema with 12+ related entities
Developed advanced reporting system with LiveCharts2 integration
Achieved responsive UI design with full dark mode support
